guitars.name: Fender American Stratocaster
guitars.description: This American made classic has three screaming single coil pickups and a candy apple red finish.

guitars.name: Gibson Les Paul
guitars.description: An icon of rock, this beauty has a flame maple top under a cherry sunburst. Sure to turn heads.

guitars.name: Parker Fly
guitars.description: This lightweight guitar of the future features a carbon glass-epoxy fingerboard and a custom vibrato bridge.

guitars.name: PRS Custom
guitars.description: A visual stunner with beautiful flame maple, two smoldering humbuckers, and distinctive bird fretboard inlays.

guitars.name: Jackson Soloist
guitars.description: Evoke the glory days of hair metal with this shred machine. Features Floyd Rose tremolo and two blistering humbuckers.

guitars.name: Epiphone Ally Kat
guitars.description: This spunky semi-hollowbody features a '57 humbucker in the bridge and a mini-humbucker in the neck for incredible versatility.

guitars.name: Gibson Flying V
guitars.description: This is not a lap guitar. Get off your ass, crank up the volume, and prepare to rock.

guitars.name: Jackson AT-1
guitars.description: This unique rock monster features a transparent blue top over quilted maple, chrome hardware, and Kahler bridge.

guitars.name: Fender Honeyburst Stratocaser
guitars.description: The classic three pickup stratocaster in a rare honey burst finish.
